hymn.title: I've wandered far away from God

layout.singingstanza: I've wan -- dered far a -- way from God, Now I'm com -- ing home; The paths of sin too long I've trod, Lord, I'm com -- ing home. Com -- ing home, com -- ing home, Nev -- er -- more to roam; O -- pen wide Thine arms of love; Lord, I'm com -- ing home.

lyrics.stanza: I've wandered far away from God, Now I'm coming home; The paths of sin too long I've trod, Lord, I'm coming home.
I've wasted many precious years, Now I'm coming home; I now repent with bitter tears, Lord, I'm coming home.
My soul is sick, my heart is sore, Now I'm coming home; My strength renew, my hope restore: Lord, I'm coming home.
